item.title: Drupal 8 - Exclude config from configuration management
item.description: Drupal 8 makes it really easy to export and import your entire configuration, which makes it easily deployable on all your environments. However, this is not always desirable when a customer controls part of that configuration. Let’s take the webform module as an example. Webforms are configuration entities in drupal 8, this means that they are automatically exported when doing a config-export, it also means that webforms which have not been exported will be removed during config-import, this is what we want to avoid.
